newsitem.title: UK: Toyota Auto Receivables prices asset-backed bond.
newsitem.headline: Toyota Auto Receivables prices asset-backed bond.

text.p: Toyota Auto Receivables Grantor Trust 97-A has priced its $755 million three-tranche asset-backed bond, joint lead managers Lehman Brothers and CSFB said.
CLASS A
AMT $723 MLN COUPON 6.45 LEGAL MAT 15.APR.02
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 99.968028 PAY DATE 17.APR.97
FULL FEES 18.50 BP REOFFER 99.968028 SPREAD +31 BP
MODDY/S&P AAA/AAA AVE LIFE 1.3 YRS
MAN & UND 6 BP SELL CONC 12.5 BP
CLASS B
AMT $21 MLN COUPON 6.6 LEGAL MAT 15.APR.02
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 99.960818 PAY DATE 17.APR.97
FULL FEES 35 BP REOFFER 99.960818 SPREAD +47 BP
MOODY/S&P A2/A MAN & UND 15 BP SELL CONC 20 BP
CLASS C
AMT $11 MLN COUPON 6.8 LEGAL MAT 15.APR.02
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 99.992572 PAY DATE 17.APR.97
FULL FEES 45 BP REOFFER 99.992572 SPREAD +65 BP
MOODY/S&P BAA3/BBB MAN & UND 20 BP SELL CONC 25 BP
COMMON TERMS
LISTING LUX/HK DENOMS (K) ONE
